/* Language: Oracle Rules Language Author: Jason Jacobson Description: The Oracle Utilities Rules Language is used to program the Oracle Utilities Applications acquired from LODESTAR Corporation. The products include Billing Component, LPSS, Pricing Component etc. through version 1.6.1. Website: https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E17904_01/dev.1111/e10227/rlref.htm Category: enterprise */ function ruleslanguage(hljs) { return { name: 'Oracle Rules Language', keywords: { keyword: 'BILL_PERIOD
